description: Price based on Cambridge Huntington Road
A track resurfaced over a significant distance to create a new strategic cycle route e.g. a towpath improved from rough track to tarmac so it becomes an everyday cycle commuting option.
A large busy road junction that was an obstacle to cycling reengineered as a junction suitable to a cyclist-friendly route.
A safe crossing point where a cycle route crosses a large busy road that would otherwise be a difficult and dangerous barrier for cyclists.
